page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
There is limited scope for entertainment in the area. One reason for this is the high proportion of elderly people living in the area. Amongst those we questioned we found many interested in gardening. Listening to the radio and watching television were also mentioned as means of entertainment.
There is neither a cinema nor a theatre in the area. Those who require such facilities would have to go to either Southampton or Salisbury. Horse riding is a popular activity and there is plenty of grassland to maintain considerable numbers of horses. Unusually there is only one pub in the area, The Hatchet, and the only football pitch in the area has been abandoned to the sheep. However, most people seem happy with the situation.
